ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] re:patch probs
ygData.msgSnippet: Sounds like its time to change ISPs. Personally, I love my cable modem! :) R ... From: kentcave To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com Sent: Saturday, April 10, 2004
ygData.messageBody:
Sounds like its time to change ISPs.
 
Personally, I love my cable modem! :)
 
R
 
 
 
----- Original Message -----
From: kentcave
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Saturday, April 10, 2004 12:17 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] re:patch probs

Thanks Eric.. I had manage to wait until the webpage fully loaded..
it shows a skull.gif and those 2 eq files are shown too..

..but after trying several times (20x) to download those two files
with and without using download express/accelerator.. somehow they
would only reach 200k and stop.. any solution to that? Thanks again.

(my isp somehow has a funny firewall that limit ur traffic to 1
line, so when downloading those patch using default eq program.. I
can only wait while waiting for one particular file (for instance
eqgame.exe) to finish and if it took too long then sometime, after
1mb my isp will disconnect.. but if I start up a website to boost
the speed, or ping the isp/patch.everquest.com to keep the
connection alive.. then the file that has been patching for awhile
will stop as it thinks I am doing something else.. sigh, so I either
had to finish d/l a 1mb file in 30min or I shall never have it
(using d/l express I can get 10mb in an hour, without using it..
usually 1mb took 20min) *I shudders at the thought of pactching
nedaria.s3d that is 4mb big*



Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
